languages.text: {n}Ториана Гапрак складывает руки аквилой.{/n} "Ни одна тень не падет на имя фон Валанциус и не затмит сияние благодетельного рода Вольного Торговца. Чтобы не говорил ваш механический пес... род Гапрак верен Вольному Торговцу".
languages.translation_comment: Ториана Гапрак — если Гапраки не были наказаны и если Ториана жива
Ториана Гапрак — если Гапраки не были наказаны и если Ториана жива

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Ториана Гапрак складывает руки аквилой.{/n} "Ни одна тень не падет на имя фон Валанциус и не затмит сияние благодетельного рода Вольного Торговца. Чтобы не говорил ваш механический пес... род Гапрак верен Вольному Торговцу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Lord Captain."

{n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Lord Captain."

{n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Lord Captain."

{n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

{n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak macht das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n} "Möge kein Schatten auf den Namen von Valancius fallen oder die Strahlkraft seiner wohlwollenden Freihändler trüben. Egal, was Euer mechanischer Köter auch sagen mag ... Haus Gaprak ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak macht das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n} "Möge kein Schatten auf den Namen von Valancius fallen oder die Strahlkraft seiner wohlwollenden Freihändler trüben. Egal, was Euer mechanischer Köter auch sagen mag ... Haus Gaprak ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben."

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak fait le signe de l'Aquila.{/n} « Aucune ombre ne ternira le renom des von Valancius ni n'éclipsera l'éclat de la lignée bienveillante {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Quoi qu'en dise votre chien mécanique... La maison Gaprak est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak fait le signe de l'Aquila.{/n} « Aucune ombre ne ternira le renom des von Valancius ni n'éclipsera l'éclat de la lignée bienveillante {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Quoi qu'en dise votre chien mécanique... La maison Gaprak est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}托丽安娜·贾帕克比了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“没有任何阴影可以玷污冯·瓦兰修斯家族的名誉，也没有任何诋毁可以歪曲行商浪人的仁慈。无论你那条机械狗说什么……贾帕克家族都始终忠于行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}托丽安娜·贾帕克比了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“没有任何阴影可以玷污冯·瓦兰修斯家族的名誉，也没有任何诋毁可以歪曲行商浪人的仁慈。无论你那条机械狗说什么……贾帕克家族都始终忠于行商浪人。”

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak hace el signo del Aquila.{/n} «Ninguna sombra puede ocultar el nombre von Valancius ni eclipsar el resplandor de su bondadosa línea de Comerciantes Independientes. Diga lo que diga su perro mecánico... la casa Gaprak es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak hace el signo del Aquila.{/n} «Ninguna sombra puede ocultar el nombre von Valancius ni eclipsar el resplandor de su bondadosa línea de Comerciantes Independientes. Diga lo que diga su perro mecánico... la casa Gaprak es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}トリアーナ・ギャプラックはアクィラの印を結んだ。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウスの名に影を落とすことも、慈悲深きローグトレーダーの血筋の輝きを曇らせることも許されません。あなたの機械犬が何と言おうと…ギャプラック家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓います」
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}トリアーナ・ギャプラックはアクィラの印を結んだ。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウスの名に影を落とすことも、慈悲深きローグトレーダーの血筋の輝きを曇らせることも許されません。あなたの機械犬が何と言おうと…ギャプラック家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓います」

languages.text: {n}Toriana Gaprak, Çift Başlı Kartal İşareti yapıyor.{/n} "Mekanik köpeğiniz ne derse desin... Von Valancius adı gölgelenmez, Hür Tacir soyunun ihsanından şüphe edilmez! Gaprak Hanesi'nin sadakati, Hür Tacir'e aittir."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n} "No shadow shall fall upon the name von Valancius or eclipse the radiance of the beneficent Rogue Trader line. Whatever your mechanical dog may say... House Gaprak is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana Gaprak, Çift Başlı Kartal İşareti yapıyor.{/n} "Mekanik köpeğiniz ne derse desin... Von Valancius adı gölgelenmez, Hür Tacir soyunun ihsanından şüphe edilmez! Gaprak Hanesi'nin sadakati, Hür Tacir'e aittir."
